QuestData.Title: The Emissary's Arrival
QuestData.Description:
I will admit that I have not left the Emerald Gardens in all my life, and as such, I have never met a centaur, let alone a mortal from the mainland.
However, I am not here for a kindly visit, but rather to plead for the centaur's aid in securing our oathstone and protecting our charge.
I am glad to see you are here to help as well. There is much to discuss.
QuestData.LogDescription: Learn about the situation in the Emerald Gardens.
QuestData.RewardText: More friendly faces are welcome indeed.

Objectives.Objective: Offer aid to the Green Dragonflight
